interface.name: org.alljoyn.locationservices.Distance.Distance
interface.description: This interface contains methods for applications to access the data of the distance service

struct.name: DistanceEntity
struct.description: The representation of a device in the distance service

struct.name: DistanceFilter
struct.description: A filter to match entities the application is interested in

method.name: DistanceDistanceSubscribe
method.description: Subscribe for events that occur when firstEntity and secondEntity are in distance. Events are only sent again if the distance change is more than deltaDistance (measured in cm)

method.name: DistanceGeofenceSubscribe
method.description: send a signal when the two entities are less than Distance from each other e.g, let me know when my son is near the fridge

method.name: QueryDistance
method.description: query the service for all entities that match the filter

method.name: QueryAllDistanceDistance
method.description: Gets all the entities that are within a specified distance
